directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.  Add spaghetti and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain, but do not rinse, and return to pot.  Stir in lentil soup and season with black pepper.  Heat through and serve.
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Pasta with Lentil Soup Sauce
